texts: {"template":"intro","texts":["To be eligible for this discount your disabled badge must have been issued in the United Kingdom or the European Economic Area (EEA). Tell us below where your badge was issued."],"link":{"image":{}},"image":{},"wrapped":false}
For Blue Badges issued in the United Kingdom, look on the front (the side without the photograph) for all the details you need.
The issuing authority is the borough or council where you live - find this in the 'issued by' box. We may contact the issuing authority to confirm that the badge details are valid.
You do not need to complete this section if your badge was issued outside the United Kingdom.
